WHEN the location modal displays
AND ‘Do Not Allow’  or ‘Deny’ is selected
WHEN MLB.tv is streamed

GIVEN a Free or Subscribed User
WHEN the location modal displays
AND ‘Only this time’ is selected
WHEN MLB.tv is immediately streamed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the location modal does not display
AND the content streams

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Subscribed User
WHEN the location modal displays
AND ‘Only this time’ is selected
AND the app is closed for at least 3 minutes then reopened
WHEN MLB.tv is streamed

GIVEN a Free or Subscribed User
WHEN the location modal displays
AND ‘Allowed while using the app’ is selected
WHEN MLB.tv is streamed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the location modal does not display
AND the content streams

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Subscribed User
WHEN ‘Allow while using app’ is NOT selected during onboarding
AND MLB.tv is streamed
AND ‘Do not allow’ is selected when the location modal displays
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the following message will display, ‘Location not enabled, please enable location to continue’ with Enable button

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Subscribed User
WHEN ‘Allow while using app’ is selected during onboarding
AND MLB.tv is streamed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the location model will not display and content will stream

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a Free or Subscribed User
WHEN the location Enable button is displaying
AND it is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the use is taken to the app settings

custom_steps_separated.content:

WHEN location is currently set to ‘do not allow’
AND location setting are changed to ‘Allowed while using the app’ in app settings
AND MLB.tv is streamed

THEN the location modal does not display
AND the content streams
